mapper.select: SELECT * FROM userseoul WHERE id = #{tel} AND address = #{address} AND #{id} AND pw = MD5(#{pw})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO userseoul (id, pw, nickname, tel, address, gender, created_date, user_idx) VALUES (#{id}, MD5(#{pw}),#{nickname}, #{tel}, #{address} , #{gender}, SYSDATE(), #{user_idx})

INSERT INTO userseoul (name, dob, email, passPortNameEng, addressDetail, jobInfo, jobType, jobName, jobAddress, jobAddressDetail) VALUES (#{name}, #{dob}, #{email}, #{passPortNameEng}, #{addressDetail}, #{jobInfo}, #{jobType}, #{jobName}, #{jobAddress}, #{jobAddressDetail})
